## Public Member Functions

### assignArg() {#a4e31012ae290be156077d90c19f46432}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AArch64CallLowering.cpp&#125;::AArch64OutgoingValueAssigner::assignArg (unsigned ValNo, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> OrigVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> ValVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> LocVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign/#a2b78fd53da0b5df7bc4eacf7df556a45">CCValAssign::LocInfo</a> LocInfo, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">CallLowering::ArgInfo</a> &amp; Info, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccstate">CCState</a> &amp; State)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Wrap call to (typically tablegenerated CCAssignFn).

This may be overridden to track additional state information as arguments are assigned or apply target specific hacks around the legacy infrastructure.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### IsReturn {#ac4ac685d0df693b84553092e8f62e097}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AArch64CallLowering.cpp&#125;::AArch64OutgoingValueAssigner::IsReturn</>}>
Track if this is used for a return instead of function argument passing.

We apply a hack to i1/i8/i16 stack passed values, but do not use stack passed returns for them and cannot apply the type adjustment.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
